about_the_game:
Embark on a Tasty Journey to Master Japanese Kana and Vocabulary!

Learn Japanese With Sushi is the ultimate beginner-friendly game that combines the excitement of Japanese conveyor sushi and gachapon culture with a fast, fun, and interactive approach to learning katakana, hiragana, and basic Japanese vocabulary—including kanji. Designed for PC, this pixel-style mini-game adventure is perfect for anyone looking to kickstart their Japanese learning journey in a vibrant, playful environment.

Features

🍣 Sushi-Inspired Mini-Games

  • Conveyor Sushi Challenge: Identify katakana and hiragana on moving sushi by typing or pressing the correct romanization.

  • Customer Orders: Match sushi with katakana or hiragana to spoken audio orders from customers.

  • Sushi Box Sorting: Pair sushi displaying kanji or katakana vocabulary with the correct sushi boxes featuring their meanings and visuals.

  • Gachapon Fun: Use coins to play the gachapon machine and unlock exciting new vocabulary.

📖 Mnemonic Dictionary

Boost your kana learning with a built-in mnemonic dictionary, making it easier to associate sounds with kana through memorable imagery and stories.

🏅 Vocabulary Levels for N5-N3 Learners

Choose vocabulary levels ranging from N5 to N3, allowing players to tailor their learning experience and focus on vocabulary that matches their proficiency.

🎮 Customizable Gameplay

  • Adjust the speed and difficulty to suit your learning pace.

  • Select specific kana sets or vocabulary ranges to focus on.

🎧 Interactive Audio

  • Hear authentic pronunciations for kana and vocabulary words.

  • Learn to connect sounds with visuals for a stronger memory link.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04+ / SteamOS 3.0+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750 / AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with Dedicated Memory
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04+ / SteamOS 3.0+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU supporting OpenGL 3.3 or Metal, with at least 512MB VRAM

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.14+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (1st Gen) or Apple M1
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with Dedicated Memory
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.14+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU supporting OpenGL 3.3 or Metal, with at least 512MB VRAM

name: Learn Japanese Kana & Vocab with Sushi

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750 / AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with Dedicated Memory
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU supporting OpenGL 3.3 or Metal, with at least 512MB VRAM

short_description: Learn Japanese With Sushi is a edutainment game that teaches Japanese through sushi-themed mini-games. Practice katakana, hiragana, and vocabulary—including kanji—by matching, typing, and sorting sushi. Unlock new words via gachapon, customize JLPT levels (N5-N3), and enjoy a pixel-art sushi bar!
